slidelink.displaytext: Who is a Subject Matter Expert?

search.slidetext: click start to start the course. welcome to the know your subject matter expert (sme) training start start start start start start
course objective identify various type of smes explain the definition of a subject matter expert (sme) by the end of this course, you will be able to: click next to proceed.
lesson 1 introduction click next to proceed.

who is a subject matter expert? click next to proceed. individuals designated as sme are typically sought out by others interested in learning more about or leveraging their unique expertise to solve specific problems or help meet particular technical challenges. a subject matter expert in business, also known as sme, is an individual with a deep understanding of a particular process, function, technology, machine, material or type of equipment.
lesson 2 types of sme click next to proceed.

the six sme archetypes following are the six archetypes of smes. click on each image to know more about the traits of each sme. once you have learned about the six archetypes of sme, click next to proceed.

you are trying to schedule a meeting with your sme but, you are not able set a time with him because of his jam - packed schedule. what kind of an sme are you dealing with? an include-it-all sme an include-it-all sme an include-it-all sme an include-it-all sme an include-it-all sme an include-it-all sme an unreliable sme an unreliable sme an unreliable sme an unreliable sme an unreliable sme an unreliable sme an unfocused sme an unfocused sme an unfocused sme an unfocused sme an unfocused sme an unfocused sme a busy bee sme a busy bee sme a busy bee sme a busy bee sme a busy bee sme a busy bee sme select the correct option and click submit. knowledge check
course summary identify various type of smes explain the definition of a subject matter expert (sme) at the end of the course, you are now able to: click next to proceed.

terms.term: A subject matter expert in business, also known as SME, is an individual with a deep understanding of a particular process, function, technology, machine, material or type of equipment.
